name: find_panels
description: Find solar panels based on various filter criteria. Can be used to list all panels, find panels in a specific cluster, or find panels with a certain status.

cluster_id.description: The ID of the cluster to search for panels in.

panel_id.description: The ID of a specific panel within a cluster. Requires cluster_id to be set.

name: get_panel_maintenance_history
description: Retrieve the maintenance and inspection history for a specific solar panel.

cluster_id.description: The cluster ID of the solar panel.

panel_id.description: The panel ID of the solar panel.

name: dispatch_drone_to_cluster
description: Dispatch an available drone to a specified solar panel cluster for a mission.

cluster_id.description: The ID of the cluster to send the drone to.

name: dispatch_rover_to_panel
description: Dispatch an available rover to a specific solar panel to perform a task.

cluster_id.description: The cluster ID of the target panel.

panel_id.description: The panel ID of the target panel.

name: get_drone_status
description: Retrieve status logs for drones. Can filter by drone ID, destination, and time.

drone_id.description: The unique identifier of the drone.

destination_cluster_id.description: Filter logs by the drone's target destination cluster ID.
